name: Jeopardy
description:
I made a full Jeopardy board. Here are the full instructions: 

1. Push the start button after clicking on the green flag

2. Now, you'll see the entire Jeopardy board with all of the topics. 

3. Click on the topic and price of you're choice

4. Now you'll see the Jeopardy prompt. Answer the prompt using the correct beginning (Ex. 'Who is...' 'What is...", etc.)  

5. *Using the trust system* If you got the answer correct click on the green button and add 1point! 

6. To return home click the home symbol in the top right corner.

7. Repeat and have fun!
